title: Tomato and red rice soup
ingredients: ['2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '6 shallots, finely chopped', '85 g (3 oz) Camargue red rice', '150 ml (5 fl oz) dry white wine', '400 ml (14 fl oz) vegetable stock', '1 can chopped tomatoes, about 400 g', '3 tbsp finely chopped fresh oregano or basil', 'salt and pepper', 'To serve', '4 tbsp crme frache', 'fresh basil or oregano leaves']
